description:
S H A D O W S

A short-ish game of hack n' slash-ing shadows for the 3HR Game Jam (Sep 23-25).

For the theme of: Stay Here Forever

Controls: Press Z to attack. Press Space to dash. Press ArrowKeys to move.

Theme Interpretation: Main idea was a shadow. A shadow exists so long as we are here.

Longer Theme Explanation: I originally thought of making a black and white game where you can play a Female and Male. Where the Female(White) will slash, while the Male(Black) will smash the enemies, but due to time restriction, I scrap it down to minuscules. So, in the end, I made it to player slashing shadows of its self.

Credits: Thanks Google Fonts for the Roboto Font!
